definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...

sentences.english: The formed mechanism of tangential currents in waters near the bayhead and its influence are discussed .

sentences.english: The difference formulas for the boundary tangential stress are derived for the constant boundary elements.

sentences.english: It is more preferable to select tangentially polarized cylindrical transducer in applica…

with all one's might/with sudden force/violently/to slam
cutting edge or point of a knife, sword or tool
to move relative to one another
to jump out of the way

definition: to make an about-turn/to reverse one's direction, policy, sequence etc/to turn things on their head
